hero.name: Vedant

about.title: üë®‚Äçüíª About Me
description: I'm Vedant ‚Äî a passionate Frontend Developer with a strong focus on building responsive, user-friendly, and visually appealing web applications. Skilled in React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS, I enjoy turning creative ideas into interactive digital experiences.
I have worked on diverse projects ranging from landing pages and e-commerce sites to AI-powered applications, always keeping performance and accessibility in mind.
I care deeply about clean architecture, high developer velocity, and improving user experience through thoughtful engineering.
Constantly exploring new web technologies and expanding into full-stack development to deliver complete solutions.

items.title: Deepseek AI Clone
items.description: A full-stack clone of DeepSeek with chat functionality, markdown rendering, OpenRouter AI integration, and Clerk auth.

items.title: Learning Management System
items.description: Designed a responsive LMS frontend with smooth course access, enrollment, and intuitive user experience.

items.title: Doctor Appointment Website
items.description: Built a responsive online doctor appointment booking interface allowing users to filter doctors by specialty and book available time slots.

items.title: Food Delivery Website
items.description: A Food delivery app with payment integration, cart features, and admin panel.
